summary: This is an email chain between US Attorney's Office personnel discussing document review batches in the Epstein case database (Relativity). The emails focus on clarifying the contents of batches, adding tags for irrelevant documents, and confirming search terms.

persons.name: Marie Villafana
persons.context: Her name appears in a folder path ('OPR Materials [tii Marie Villafana 2020-08-26 rol 2020-09-09') referenced in the email chain regarding document batches.

events.title: Email discussion on Epstein document review
events.description: US Attorney's Office personnel exchange emails to clarify the contents of document batches (Batch 003 and Batch 004) in the Epstein Relativity database, discuss adding tags for irrelevant documents, and confirm search terms.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain from March 15, 2021, regarding the review of documents in the Epstein case database (Relativity).
It references two specific batches: Batch 003 (USAO-SDFL data) and Batch 004 (OPR Materials), with the latter including a folder path mentioning Marie Villafana.
The emails discuss the need to add a tag to documents that have 'nothing to do with the Epstein case' to aid in future review.
The correspondence confirms search terms and STR (Structured Threat Reporting) hits related to the document review process.
